column2: ReraRO yatkarma RO cet sa kartA'nADyAne
karmaRi ca yena saMsparSAt kartuH SarIrasuKam
kriyAsamaBihAre low; lowo hisvO; vA ca taDvamoH
janapadinAM janapadavat sarvaM janapadena samAnaSabdAnAM bahuvacane
tadvAnAsAmupaDAno mantra itIzwakAsu luk ca matoH
na yvAByAM padAntAByAm pUrvO tu tAByAmEc
radAByAM nizWAto naH pUrvasya ca daH
